snippet.title: Sonic and the Steel of Darkness - OPENING (WIP Animation)
snippet.description:
My practice with ToonBoom Studio (StoryBoard) finally paid off. Although, this kinda counts of a practice animation though.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Sonic and the Steel of Darkness now has its own animation sketch for its own opening. Take note that the music doesn't belong to me and it is unsure to be used in its final version. As always, this is a prototype; so there will be some missing parts and background and choppy movement. 

Tell me what you guys think of the animation in the comment section down below.

Music/Remix belongs to The Grave Scratt:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZWlEe1j3S_g

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Don't forget to LIKE or SUBSCRIBE :D

Follow me on...
DeviantArt: http://jamestechno998.deviantart.com/
